thread.title: UK weather hotter than Rome as Caribbean heat blast pushes Britain to 17C – before snow and gales batter nation at end of week
thread.title_full: UK weather hotter than Rome as Caribbean heat blast pushes Britain to 17C – before snow and gales batter nation at end of week

author: jshammas
title: UK weather hotter than Rome as Caribbean heat blast pushes Britain to 17C – before snow and gales batter nation at end of week
text:
Opinion HERE COMES THE SUN UK weather hotter than Rome as Caribbean heat blast pushes Britain to 17C – before snow and gales batter nation at end of week 
Brits who enjoyed a hint of Spring in recent days need to prepare for a dramatic change in conditions BY JOHN SHAMMAS
